Card.drink1desc: White rum, fresh mint, and lime juice, lightly sweetened and topped with soda. A crisp, refreshing Cuban classic.
Card.drink2desc: A vibrant cocktail mixing zesty blood orange with a hint of sweetness. Served over crushed ice and garnished with a blood orange slice, it's the perfect refreshing drink for warm days and stunning sunsets.
Card.drink3desc: A vibrant cocktail with a deep red hue, blending tart berries with zesty citrus. Garnished with dried citrus and delicate flowers, it offers a refreshing, floral taste that's as striking as its appearance.
Card.drink4desc: Dive into the Blue Lagoon Margarita, a refreshing twist on the classic margarita. This vibrant blue cocktail blends tequila, lime, and a splash of blue curaçao, garnished with fresh mint and lime.
Card.drink5desc: This refreshing cocktail blends citrus and strawberry flavors in a stunning layered presentation. Topped with fresh orange slices and a strawberry, it's a vibrant and fruity delight, perfect for any occasion.
Card.drink6desc: Indulge in the Caramel Velvet, a creamy cocktail with rich caramel and coffee notes. Topped with a biscuit and a hint of cherry, this decadent drink is perfect for dessert or a cozy evening treat.
Card.drink7desc: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail combines the warmth of bourbon with the zest of fresh orange and the sweetness of a cherry garnish. Perfect for a refined, timeless sip.
Card.drink8desc: Refresh yourself with the Lemon Mint Cooler, a zesty blend of fresh lemon juice and mint leaves over ice. This vibrant cocktail is perfect for a sunny day, offering a crisp, invigorating taste with every sip.
Card.drink9desc: The Classic Aperol Spritz is a timeless Italian aperitif, blending Aperol, prosecco, and a splash of soda. Served over ice with a slice of orange, it's a refreshing and slightly bitter drink, perfect for any occasion.

Specials.title: Discover New Flavors
Specials.desc: Indulge in our expertly crafted cocktails, where innovation meets tradition. Each sip is a journey through taste and elegance.
Specials.drink-desc1: A classic blend of gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and Champagne, garnished with a lemon twist.
Specials.drink-desc2: A sophisticated mix of vodka, fresh lemon juice, and homemade lavender syrup, finished with a lavender sprig.
Specials.drink-desc3: Bourbon, smoked rosemary syrup, Angostura bitters, and a hint of orange, served with a smoked rosemary sprig.
Specials.drink-desc4: Tequila, lime juice, Cointreau, and spicy pineapple puree, with a tajín rim and a slice of jalapeño.

About.title: About
About.text1: Nestled in the heart of the city, our cocktail bar is a haven for those who appreciate the art of mixology. Founded by a group of passionate bartenders, our story began with a simple love for crafting unique, memorable experiences one drink at a time. We believe in the magic that happens when the finest spirits meet fresh ingredients and a touch of creativity. From classic cocktails to innovative concoctions, every sip tells a story. Join us and become part of our journey.
About.text2: At the heart of our bar lies our commitment to crafting cocktails that are as unforgettable as they are delicious. Each drink is a masterpiece, meticulously designed to balance flavors, aromas, and aesthetics. Our menu features a curated selection of classics alongside our signature creations, all made with the finest ingredients sourced from around the world. Whether you’re a fan of timeless favorites or adventurous blends, every cocktail is a journey, carefully mixed to perfection and served with a touch of flair.

Contact-us-component.success-alert: Thank you. We will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
